0.cdata!:
Republica de Colombia - Al Proyecto de
            Desarrollo Regional del Magdalena Medio

trustfund:
TF027064-PHRD-MAGDALENA MEDIO REGIONAL
            DEV. PROJ.,TF039510-COLOMBIA - SUSTAINABLE
            DEVELOPMENT OF THE SIERRA NEVADA (LIL),TF036398-GLOBAL - COMMUNITY BASED DEVELOPMENT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Magdalena Medio Regional Development
            Project seeks to develop the operational capacity of the
            Consortium for the Program for Development and Peace of the
            Magdalena Medio Region (PDPMM), the Citizen's Network,
            and other partners to work together towards collectively
            defined objectives to reduce poverty and increase peaceful
            coexistence in the Magdalena Medio Region. There are two
            project components. The first component will build the
            capacity of the Consortium and Citizen's Network to
            implement the Program for Development and Peace. It will
            develop the Consortium's capacity to move from a
            participatory planning mode to an operational mode
            characterized by acting as a catalyst among beneficiaries
            and stakeholders, promoting the establishment of effective
            partnerships with other organizations, and dealing
            effectively with the diverse interests of key stakeholders
            in the region. It will also strengthen the Citizen's
            Network so that it is capable of influencing public affairs
            and implementing development projects based on local
            initiatives. The second component will develop, test, and
            document approaches which bring together community processes
            and resources around specific development initiatives agreed
            upon by citizens and authorities of selected municipalities
            or sub-regions of Magdalena Medio.
